bug.author: epapathom
bug.description:
System information
Have I written custom code (as opposed to using a stock example script provided in TensorFlow): Yes OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04): Google Colab TensorFlow installed from (source or binary): - TensorFlow version (use command below): 2.2.0-rc2
Describe the current behavior Tensorflow 2.2.0-rc2 cannot find Adam in tf.keras.optimizers. Standalone code to reproduce the issue optimizer = tf.keras.optimizers.Αdam(2e-4)
